subject: Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Players from Wagner’s 50-48 victory over Hofstra on Jan. 6, 1960, which spoiled Hofstra’s undefeated men’s basketball season, came together again Tuesday.
snippet: Players from Wagner’s 50-48 victory over Hofstra on Jan. 6, 1960, which spoiled Hofstra’s undefeated men’s basketball season, came together again Tuesday.
